remarks: Express a singleton function in maps-to notation.  Version of ~ fmptsn allowing the mapping value to depend on the mapping variable (usual case).  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2019.)
statement:
fmptsng.1 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fmptsng $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ C e. W ) -> { <. A , C >. } = ( x e. { A } |-> B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
